item.title: Events
item.author: info@ldaca.edu.au (Language Data Commons of Australia)
item.description: Forthcoming Workshops Previous Workshopsâ€ƒWebinars Advice for researchers Forthcoming Workshops Previous Workshops If your university or organisation would like to host a workshop, please contact us. Webinars Our webinar series is a joint initiative with the Language Technology and Data Analysis Laboratory (LADAL) at the School of Languages and Cultures, The University of Queensland. Advice for researchers LDaCA has previously run regular online office hours, jointly hosted with the Australian Digital Observatory (ADO).
